# NTD-TS2.2.xlsx

- source: https://www.transit.dot.gov/ntd/ntd-data

# ua_list_all.txt
- title: Urban Area List Files (all urban areas: urbanized areas + urban clusters)

- source: http://www2.census.gov/geo/docs/reference/ua/ua_list_all.txt
